directions: In a saucepan over medium heat, stir together the mustard, sweetener, cider vinegar, chili powder, black pepper, white pepper, and cayenne pepper. Simmer for 30 minutes.
Stir in the soy sauce, butter, and liquid smoke; simmer for 10 more minutes. Cool completely, and refrigerate overnight to blend flavors before using.
ingredients: 1/2 cup granular no-calorie sucralose sweetener (e.g., Splenda ®)
title: Carolina Style Low Carb Barbecue Sauce
